001.comments: Introduction to Contemporary Art Music.  An introductory repertoire course for composers.  This course focuses on compositional issues and approaches in art music of the past fifty years.  Coursework includes listening, score study, readings, quizzes and in-class presentations.  Restricted to undergraduate composition majors; other BMus students by permission of the instructor.  2020W Term 1 Format:  Students will attend a weekly online seminar on Thursdays from 1:30-3:00 pm

description: Contemporary music repertoire, emphasizing music from the past fifty years. Required of undergraduate Composition majors; open to other Bachelor of Music students by permission of instructor.
